summary: Most core flow requirements (4-page single-page flow with Next buttons, dark theme typography, Page 4 evasive No button, in-place Yes outcome with hearts) appear implemented. However, the diff indicates an extra Page5Final component exists (suggesting an unrequested 5th page), the specified pre-processed grayscale image asset is not shown as created/used, and not all three user-uploaded images are used as default imagery.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use only the user-uploaded images (6de4a0ed8a66079b44f32ddcb86801a1-7.jpg, Snapchat-44209910-7.jpg, 8cea9dbe688448677b472a8d5e73118d-11.jpg) as default imagery for Page 2 and Page 3 image areas, stored and referenced as static frontend assets.
missing_requirements.reason: Page 2 and Page 3 default image URLs reference only Snapchat-44209910-7.jpg and 8cea9dbe688448677b472a8d5e73118d-11.jpg; there is no evidence the third uploaded image (6de4a0ed8a66079b44f32ddcb86801a1-7.jpg) is used anywhere as a default image.

missing_requirements.requirement: Convert Snapchat-44209910-7.jpg to a grayscale image with gentle contrast suitable for a dark UI (Snapchat-44209910-7.jpg > page2-grayscale.dim_800x1200.jpg).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a CSS grayscale filter applied at render time, but does not show creation or usage of the specified processed asset filename (page2-grayscale.dim_800x1200.jpg).

hallucinated_features.description: A separate 'Page 5' final page component (and references to it) despite the requirement of exactly 4 sections with the final outcome shown in-place on Page 4.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids adding more than 4 sections/pages and requires the final outcome to be revealed within Page 4. The diff summary indicates a Page5Final component exists and is described as a final page.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduction of a hugging-couple GIF on the final page.
hallucinated_features.reason: No GIF (or any additional final-page image) was requested; the request also restricts default visuals to only the provided user-uploaded images.
